### How to Print or Convert to PDF:
##### *Printing*

1. Open the HTML document in your web browser (preferably Google Chrome) from where you saved it. 
2. In the upper right hand corner, click on the 3 vertical dots. Click on "Print". 
3. Choose your desired printer and print settings, then click "Print". 

##### *Converting to PDF*

1. Follow Steps 1 and 2 from the Printing guide. 
2. Instead of choosing a printer location, in the Destination field, choose "Save to PDF". 
3. Choose your desired PDF settings, then click "Save".
